item.title: AFK command
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Try “sM” instead of “txt4” also if that doesn’t work
Copy SinzScapeServer’s Command.

Read full topic

item.title: AFK command
item.dc:creator: @sinzscapeserver sinzscapeserver
item.description:
@sinzscapeserver wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“afk”)) {
startAnimation(1353);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

plrText = “I’m AFK!”;
plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
sM(“To return, type ::afkoff”);
}

if (command.startsWith(“afkoff”)) {
startAnimation(6);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

plrText = “I’m Back!”;
plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: AFK command
item.dc:creator: @dvdnext dvdnext
item.description:
@dvdnext wrote:

ok i got this code

[code]}
if (command.startsWith(“afk”)) {
startAnimation(1353);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

txt4 = "I'm AFK!";					
string4UpdateRequired = true;                     
}

if (command.startsWith(“afkoff”)) {
startAnimation(6);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

txt4 = "I'm Back!";					
string4UpdateRequired = true;                     
}[/code]

im using 317 server so i now command.starwith must be command.equalsIgnoreCase
byt u still get these errors:::

client.java:7343: cannot find symbol symbol : variable txt4 location: class client txt4 = "I'm AFK!"; ^ client.java:7344: cannot find symbol symbol : variable string4UpdateRequired location: class client string4UpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:7352: cannot find symbol symbol : variable txt4 location: class client txt4 = "I'm Back!"; ^ client.java:7353: cannot find symbol symbol : variable string4UpdateRequired location: class client string4UpdateRequired = true; ^ 4 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

Read full topic
